skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Can attack from close range, reload time: 6s
Can launch torpedoes from medium range; another torpedo cannot be fired unless an already launched torpedo has hit the enemy/expired

skills.name: Pride of the Fleet (旗の意地)
text: If Jervis is set as the Flagship, increase the Speed of all allied Destroyers by 10%
When battle starts, gains 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge. 20% chance to gain an additional charge, +20% for every additional DD in same fleet.

skills.name: Rebellious Charter (反律の掟)
text: During the start of a Day/Night battle, Jervis gains an "Umbrella" charge, then 1 additional every 10s
If the number of "Umbrella" is above 1, firing a [Torpedo Salvo] consumes 1 charge and increases Jervis' [Torpedo Salvo] Damage by 40%.

skills.name: Ultimate Umbrella (天下の傘)
text: If Jervis has at least 1 Umbrella charge, 100% chance to consume all "Umbrella" charges to let Jervis avoid a single attack.

comment: A classy little lady. Acts older than her age and is capable of planning things out. Is easily fascinated by new people and things, where she'll behave closer to a child. Everyone likes to treat her with new things.
